title: Vegetable Stir-fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a colorful mix of seasonal vegetables and a savory sauce.

title: Classic Beef Burgers
summary: Juicy beef patties with melted cheddar, fresh lettuce, and a toasted bun. A timeless classic.

title: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
summary: Tender and flavorful roasted chicken with fresh lemon, garlic, and herbs. Perfect for a family dinner.
